title: Fijian Beachfront Paradise with Daily Breakfast and Indulgent Inclusions
description: Take a break from reality and escape to a Fijian paradise, located steps from the white sands of famed Natadola Beach on Fijiâ€™s main island of Viti Levu. Embrace island life at the chic Yatule Resort & Spa and enjoy daily breakfast, two dinners during your stay, a bottle of wine on arrival to celebrate your escape, a 50-minute massage per person and convenient round-trip airport transfers.
